snippet.title: Sandwalkers - Official Full Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Sandwalkers now! 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1639080?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=full%20release%20trailer
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/sandwalkers

Prepare for new adventures as Sandwalkers is making its way out of Early Access on April 8! V2.0 brings new maps to explore, new enemies, and quests that will unlock the path to resurrect Umama. 

#gaming #roguelike #turnbased #explorationgame
